dc_title_s: Description du pays armorique à pres Bretaigne.
dc_description_s: Relief shown pictorially. Includes three engraved circles containing lunar and tidal information. An obelisk also serves as the scale cartouche. No. 12 from Leclerc's 1619 "Théatre du Royaume de France". From the Composite Atlas of France, title created to represent a unique collection within the Clark Library, University of Michigan. 1 map; 34 x 47 cm. This map is in the public domain. Please attribute access and use of this digitized map to the Stephen S. Clark Library, University of Michigan Library.
dc_creator_sm: Bouguereau, Maurice, d. 1596,Leclerc, Jean, 1560-1621. Théatre géographique du Royaume de France.,Vignaud, Henry, 1830-1922, former owner, Composite Atlas of France.
